views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9.3.3 - 12.x

Adds a way to check tweak compatibility in Cydia. Click the search icon in the upper right on any package details page, to see if the community has flagged your package as 'working' with your running iOS version.

A full list of working tweaks can be found

A github account is required to flag tweaks as working/not

The whole thing is hosted

Configure options from Settings.

fixes crashes

Added iOS 12 support for unc0ver
Better support for cydia dark mode apps, specifically Turkey
Replaces bottom bar with a less wordy and more native toolbar
Removed preference options that are deprecated.
Adds preferences bundle
Adds tweak compatible status icon to package listing
Adds mini view
Adds option to choose iOS version to compare against
Adds dark mode
Adds swipe gestures to toggle between mini and full mode
Added the website directly into the cydia sources list
Much cleaner UI
Easier way to add new repos from within cydia
Scrollview for yall on iOS < 11.1.2, so you can see what's working against major iOS releases
Squashed many bugs
Added a beta repo
Better inform review submitters that issues are unmonitored by tweak developers
- Fixes the action button overlapping the webview
- Link info button directly to the correct tweak version


- Fixes cydia freeze with electron


- Update for iOS 11 electra jailbreak
- Injects compatibility status directly into the cydia package details page
- Optimized code to download smaller files

Requires coolstar's substitute if running with electra
